botania.page.flowers0: Seeds can be crafted to grow $(thing)16$(0) differently colored $(item)Mystical Flowers$(0). $(p)These flowers can also be grown with $(item)Floral Fertilizer$(0) (read on).
botania.page.flowers18: There're also some taller variants of the typical $(item)Mystical Flowers$(0). These can be plucked for twice the petals a normal flower would yield.
botania.page.mushrooms0: Sprinkling some $(item)Petals$(0) on a $(item)Mushrooms$(0) seems to mutate the latter. The $(item)Mushroom$(0) changes shape, takes on the color of the Petal, and glows dimly; in addition, it's usable as a substitute $(l:basics/flowers)$(item)Mystical Petal$(0)$(/l).
